content: ideas project ideas use different materials there are so many materials you could use - thick wool yarns - middle acryl yarns - fine cotton yarns - embroidery floss - raffia - package string - gift ribbon / gift curling ribbon - yarn made from plastic bags - … examples of squares in different threads acrylic yarn cotton thread package string square crocheted in different colours the different sizes depending on the yarn page 12 of 13 © 2008 by www unikatissima com square n fair - margarethe project ideas make different items and there are so many items you can make from crochet squares - clothing - sweaters / vests / tops / cardigans … - scarves / shawls / headbands … - hats / mittens / wristwarmers … - skirts … - aprons … possible combination for top - accessories for you squares and ribbon - purses / wallets / totes … - scrunchies - collars / appliqués … - book covers / journal covers … - accessories for home - tablecloths / place mats / glass coasters … - pillows / pillow belts - curtains / window decorations / door decorations … - bedthrows / afghans… - more much more - ornaments for greeting cards … possible combination for tote without strap pillow belts squares squares and squeezed squares possible combinations for scarves page 13 of 13 © 2008 by www unikatissima com
